website_summaries.verdict: The premium option for a complete foot and lower leg massage from both sides at once.
pros: Single unit construction makes it easy to get the feet and legs in mere seconds
Massage motors are more consistent than many airbag massagers
cons: Large unit takes up more space than typical airbag calf and leg massagers

customer_reviews.title: Great value!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent massage !!!!!!! My feet and legs nonstop!!!!! Super relaxing!!!!! My husband and I love it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Iris Zhang

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: If you're one who suffers from achy feet-especially after a workout, you'll be thrilled with his product. It's ultra-comfortable and massages your calves as well. Now, if you've got a low pain threshold and you don't like deep tissue massage, that would be my only caution. However, I LOVE the deep tissue massage for my feet and it really irons out the soreness and fatigue after a long day or work out. It costs more than some products but I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Westenberg

customer_reviews.title: I'm Impressed. Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at several units on Amazon and decided on this one. Its was quite a bit more expensive than the others so I was worried the quality wouldn't be good. I received it and I am absolutely thrilled and delighted with the quality of the product. It is everything I hoped it would be, the massage on my feet and calves is delightful. I have neuropathy on one side and I use this several times a day now and it really helps me feel better. I am so happy I chose this product and this vendor, the price was well worth the quality I received. It gets an A++ from me. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Vernon Nash

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY PENNY !!!!!!!! ,I spent weeks researching and reading reviews best one on the market
customer_reviews.text: cant say enough how happy im , i purchased another machine before this one at half the cost but , the saying is true "you pay for what you get" I had send it back , this machine is awesome it does its job at the end of day having this machine is AWESOME AWESOME , it does what its supposed to do which relax and massage you from a long days work thank you for a great job and design , And of course AMAZON ROCKS gets it to your door step in a couple days priceless thank you
customer_reviews.author: Bowl of Greens

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I super crazy love it. It's really amazing! Fully functions, I can put the top down to enjoy entire foot massage or get the top on to enjoy massage include my legs. There are two buttons pads, so whatever which way I choose, I can easily control this machine. Heat function control the temperature perfect. Worth to have it because I don't need go to massage store, it saves me a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Cheng Huang

customer_reviews.title: well constructed
customer_reviews.text: Time will tell, but it seems to be very durable. Set-up was a snap. Plugs into any outlet. Very relaxing. The only problem we had was using it too much. Use in moderation. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: jack

customer_reviews.title: Works Entire Lower Legs & Feet
customer_reviews.text: Nice design with a dual purpose. I find it a most enjoyable massage. There's great variety in the adjustments & functions. The machine is stylish in design and folds down - I sit it upright when not in use, taking up a smallish footprint for a unit this size. I especially enjoy the massaging 'squeeze' at the heel area - feels great. This machine goes beyond expectations. Very Impressed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Maven

customer_reviews.title: I love this machine.
customer_reviews.text: I use this several times a day and most days for the last month. I have been having lots of trouble with my feet feeling hot and stinging. I worried I might be developing neuropathy and hoped that the massage would increase my circulation and help with the stinging and burning. It has helped. I am not having the discomfort I was having before using this machine.
customer_reviews.author: MLH

customer_reviews.title: Think before you purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The massage is too strong and cannot be adjusted to s more comfortable level. It says adjustable but the lowest pressure is still too strong. I cannot message just my calves. It truly is a huge waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy C

customer_reviews.title: Strong foot massager, may be too weak on the legs for some
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Mother’s Day gift for my mom suffering from frequent foot and leg cramps. For those who prefer a strong massage, this gives an excellent, firm, kneading massage for the feet (just have to make sure to insert both feet all the way to the front in order to prevent the CRUSHING pain at the ball of the foot), but the leg portion may be a bit too weak for some as it massages using the inflatable pads over kneading balls. Overall, this has excellent quality and design; I update if any changes are noted.
customer_reviews.author: Esther K

customer_reviews.title: great product, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: foot and calf massager works great, for adults or kids. We had dozens of guests who wouldnt stop using it. very durable, we used it all winter during ski season. I broke the power cord when i moved it in my car. Customer service was great, sent me a new power cord within days, free of charge, no hassle! keep in mind, the intensity level starts at medium (purple)...Blue is the weakest, red is the strongest. Once you know that, you're all set. Would highly recommend this product. Enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within a week
customer_reviews.text: The massager worked great for less than a week. Then the air pressure stopped working in the foot area which made the foot massage part useless. Also, it is hard to tell what strength level by the color coding. There is no key to the colors so you dont know how strong its gonna be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Foot Massager
customer_reviews.text: After a few weeks since I bought this massager, I find this is one thing I can’t live without! If you are on your feet all day long, this is what you need at the end of the day to provide a much needed relief. It has even improved my quality of sleep at night. The machine is easy to operate with adjustable levels and optional heat. It’s foldable for easy storage or if you just want a foot massage without the calf. The cover comes off for easy cleaning. The only area needs improvement is that the calf section could be made longer to accommodate taller people. Overall, I’m quite happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Z.

customer_reviews.title: Great for family
customer_reviews.text: My whole entire family enjoys it. It’s been over 2 months and half. At first I said it hurt my feet and legs but then get used to it and said it feels awesome. The only negative aspect is that if you are short or in a chair, you have to position yourself in a certain way to get a good massage.
customer_reviews.author: Stop shopping here!

customer_reviews.title: Great Great Foot Messager
customer_reviews.text: This product does truly work. It will massage away foot pain and relieve your stress. I would highly recommend this product. It is a little pricey, but it is well worth. I am on my feet all day at work and in 15 minutes of using this foot messager, all the pain is gone and my feet feel great. I would highly recommend purchasing this foot messsger
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Very well-built great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great product I recommend it to anyone I'm going to buy another one from my father
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this product since late January 2020 The “scraping” foot option does not function properly. It no longer kneads the bottom of the foot on either side. Instead, it rattles and becomes unpleasantly LOUD because of the broken rollers. All it does is squeeze the feet and calves while hurting your eardrums. Vibration setting is not relaxing; heating does work but only in the feet, and for a calf massage - it squeezes and releases you four times in a cycle. I do not recommend, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: laura hammer

customer_reviews.title: THE ONE
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from very swollen hot feet. I have tried many massage machines and returned after no positive effects nor any relief. I have finally found THE ONE!!!! It is such a relief, it vibrates, compress, and massages. Best of all its a 360 massage on feet. Massage felt on top of feet as well. I LOVE IT! 😆
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Best foot massager
customer_reviews.text: Great foot massager. Calf massage jjst offers compression but it is nice to have the option of using both or only one at a time. I love this massager and bought several as gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HURTS SO GOOD
customer_reviews.text: Be careful- the strength can be too intense for some! For me personally, I love it!! I also enjoy the foldable option!
customer_reviews.author: Julie H

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: The leg massager portion of my machine stopped working after five months. I contacted the company and they replaced my machine and reminded me I have a two year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: pinklady

customer_reviews.title: OK product..not worth the cost!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this about 30 minutes ago. I was very excited as most reviews were positive. Well, IT IS NOT OK. Nothing is be overly excited or happy about...WAY OVERPRICED. If you are wanting this to help with calf pain, you will be VERY DISAPPOINTED...VERY!!! For $100.00 maybe. SO DISAPPOINTED!!
customer_reviews.author: Dissatisfied

customer_reviews.title: Keep moving feet forward
customer_reviews.text: Rolling and vibration keep moving feet forward. It get worse when air compression is added. To a point that feet are barely touched.
customer_reviews.author: valeria

customer_reviews.title: Great look, great price for this salon type product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product bought for my son dealing with Neuropathy as a result if Chemo treatments. He can just use the feet section. Also he can have calf massage. He loves it. Very durable. Hes a size 12. I think if you are a 12.5 it would cut short.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline NC

customer_reviews.title: Well made and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: A bit on the heavy side. But feels well made and durable. Took a little getting used to the different settings, but overall nice massager
customer_reviews.author: Si

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This thing is intense, so not for the faint at heart. But excellent after a long day’s work. This company also has excellent customer service. I had an issue with mine and they were extremely helpful. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Shelvey Smith

customer_reviews.title: Helped my foot pain go away by using daily
customer_reviews.text: I would like it to rub in more then one area of my foot. But using it every day has actually made it so I can walk without pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great but missing remote control. 5 star if remote was there
customer_reviews.text: great but missing remote control. 5 star if remote was there
customer_reviews.author: pg

customer_reviews.title: Barely lasts a few months of use
customer_reviews.text: It was great at first, but then the foot massager started to make sounds and did not function properly. I returned and repurchased a second one, after a few months the thigh massage function completely stopped working all together.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Lam

customer_reviews.title: I love this product.
customer_reviews.text: When I had tested this massager out. Its technique and vibration is soo good. The best part is the massage on the feet. The calf I feel still needs more improvement, because it feels unbalance with the massage on the feet. The only thing I would like to see add on is something to allow the foot massager to slant.
customer_reviews.author: hvt45

customer_reviews.title: Personal massage at home.
customer_reviews.text: This feels like real hands on my feet, pressure was serious so be careful, and relax at home.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I normally do not write reviews, but OMG this is amazing. I have very larg calf’s and could not find anything that would work but this one was does. Well worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This one works!
customer_reviews.text: Much appreciated massage. Remote...for what? The buttons are at finger tips.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is AAAAAAMAZING I bought one for my aunt and one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: john minnis

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. High quality and worth the price. Solid build..
customer_reviews.author: Muchun Niu

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: great product. it help us relaxed our feet after work. used by 4 of us. my wife and my 2 teens.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Aldeguer Jr

customer_reviews.title: Worth it 💯👌
customer_reviews.text: Worth to purchase! I always walk around town. Everyday. And when I used this one, I feel so good. It really makes me feel light. I can breathe so deep and good. You should have it!
customer_reviews.author: CasperGreen

customer_reviews.title: Who wouldn't buy
customer_reviews.text: I Like it so so so much its very comfortable and make you relaxed after long day at work so Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Ali albishi

customer_reviews.title: Pleased so far
customer_reviews.text: The foot and ball calf message works great d so far
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and I am using it to the best
customer_reviews.author: meenakshi

customer_reviews.title: Breaks Quickly
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product in Sept.2018 -- way less than a year ago -- and have barely used it. I have always followed its directions precisely. Suddenly, even though all power lights are lit, it just stopped working. Something is cheaply made or badly designed in the control panel, no doubt. My only option is to ship this heavy item back at my expense. Buyer beware. For $300, you should expect much, much better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chorch

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed, an understatement!
customer_reviews.text: I've had my Naipo massager for two days. I like the thing so much that I used it several times the first day. The next morning the bottoms of my feet were sore. My fault because the directions discourage too much usage the first few days. To say the least, I am impressed. This massager will have daily use! Follow up: I did have a slight issue with my Naipo Foot Massager but the company (Jasmine) in customer service went out of his way to rectify my small issue. What a class outfit. Now, what is my next Naipo Product!! I already have the Naipo chair and shoulder massagers, both excellent!
customer_reviews.author: George E. Corwin

customer_reviews.title: Great foot and ankle massage
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine. The only issue I have is that it its a bit rough. I mitigate this issue by wearing socks. Awesome though. I use is every night.
customer_reviews.author: placebo787

customer_reviews.title: i love this massager
customer_reviews.text: i thought the adaper was missing, naipo gave me the choice of returning or i could buy adapter and they would reimburse me the cost, but i found it and i love this massager, i should have read the instructions first, on high it is very powerful, the low pressure is great, it is almost as good as a person rubbing feet and calves
customer_reviews.author: Renee in Muskogee

customer_reviews.title: Good and Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: Looks like Darth Vader but it is okay with me (Star Wars fan). Two months now using it 20 times a day. Intensity is strong and uncomfortable during the first days of initial use. As the feet have adjusted to the pressure and got used to it after several days of use, it feels so nice, relieving and relaxing. Too bad the price as dropped down since I purchased it in February.
customer_reviews.author: dHermit

customer_reviews.title: Good design. Massage is good
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. If you want foot and calves get the big one or two separate one. This one only has a good design. I kept it because of its design. I wish it did a better job for the price I paid. I don't have room to have a bunch. This has limited functionality for calves and food. The limited modes are also weird because i dont know what mode it is. The color changes blue purple red. The instructions don't state what each color means.
customer_reviews.author: Metan

customer_reviews.title: it's perfect, it's so powerful and completely soothes the soreness ...
customer_reviews.text: Received today, can't wait to use, it's perfect, it's so powerful and completely soothes the soreness of my legs. Strongly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Rubing S.

customer_reviews.title: Great but heating function only works on one foot
customer_reviews.text: I really love this machine but the heating function only works on the left side not the right side. My feet get cold during the winter. I really need the heat function. Got to return it. So sad.
customer_reviews.author: C. Her

customer_reviews.title: Don’t think about it - BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down, the best foot massager ever! I have used it about a month and have nothing but positive things to say! After a long day at work, I can’t wait to come home, have hot chocolate and my foot massager! Best gift ever and I bought it for myself and my fam for the holidays.... but I I don’t really like to share it lol. Definitely a must buy, worth every penny!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren S

customer_reviews.title: Ok product. Wish it had different rotating patterns. It only has different pressure settings.
customer_reviews.text: The pressure in the front and on the ballot your feet is very high but very low On the heel and on the legs. Heat works very well. Just wish there was more pressure on the heel and mid foot.
customer_reviews.author: Tru

customer_reviews.title: Did not last for an year.
customer_reviews.text: It was working fine for while but compression stop working less than an year. Without compression Massage is just useless Total use is about 40times.
customer_reviews.author: Mimijaja

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working and not good massager
customer_reviews.text: Top portion to press calf muscle stopped working. Also it is not helpful on the legs at all. Overpriced item which fails to do proper massage.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Great product for it's price point!
customer_reviews.text: Just what was needed by the wife. It does shanks to foot - vibrates, massages, heated, customization, etc. Great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Samsam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect massager
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and use it every other day. Also, there was a small issue about calf inflater/deflator after 5mo of use and Naipo replaced the unit within and shipped new unit within 3 days. All was through email communication and very timely. I highly recommend this product and awesome customer service
customer_reviews.author: Nish

customer_reviews.title: Nice and helpful
customer_reviews.text: Nice massager. I really happy to get really a great foot massage with out get helped
customer_reviews.author: sho vinee

customer_reviews.title: Too strong  it will hurt
customer_reviews.text: The box is open. That mean this is used and it's too strong. It hurts my toes so bad
customer_reviews.author: Bangtam Do

customer_reviews.title: Feels Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great, one size fits all so may not be for everyone. i would think anyone with huge feet arent going to be able to get a lot out of this
customer_reviews.author: John TeeLee

product_meta.title: Naipo Foot and Calf Massager Foldable Machine Shiatsu Rolling Tapping and Air Compression Feet Massage with Heat, Leg Beautician Massager
feature_bullets: 【Two-in-one Foot Massager】This machine is not only a foot massager but also a foot and calf massager, easy to manipulate with 2 correspondingly activated touch panels. The unique calf massage can help you alleviate leg discomfort caused by standing or sitting for a long time, exercise and work, relieve stress and relax the calf.

【Multifunctional Foot Calf Massage】 Shiatsu kneading rolling massage on forefeet and soles, air compression with heat therapy surrounding the feet, tapping on the heels, all of these functions are combined together to provide you an immersive relaxing and professional foot massage. The kneading massage balls are electric, and you don't need to move your feet to enjoy the massage.

【Unique Calf Air Compression Therapy】When unfolded, choose "LEGS" mode to enjoy combined foot kneading tapping massage plus foot & calf part compression massage; If choose "SCRAPING" mode, only foot part kneading tapping and air compression massage will be activated. There are three kinds of intensities adjustment for airbag massage, the default is in purple, the medium intensity, pink is the highest intensity, and blue is the weakest intensity.

【Fashionable and Practical Massage】 The leg massager is modern and fashionable with a "X" pattern. Removable covers ensure easy care and hygienic use; Get yourself or your loved ones with this unique massager and enjoy the luxury therapist-mimicking foot and calf massage at home.

【Excellent After-sales Service】Customers can return this product within 30 days of receipt without reason, and we offer a 24-month guarantee for quality-related issues. You are welcomed to contact our customer service at any time via amazon or the official email. Our products are compatible with 110-240V, which can be used all around the world. You can take them to any country without the trouble of carrying conversion plugs.
